pages.title: Kamen Rider Zaia
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Zero-One Others: Kamen Rider MetsubouJinrai (2021, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:zero_one/devices/zaia_thousandriver#zaia_thousandriver_zaia)ZAIA Thousandriver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance II$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Strength III
